## Installation

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# Install development version from GitHub
devtools::install_github("tidymass/tinytools")
```

## Usage

Run pkgdown from the package directory each time you release your package:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
pkgdown::build_site()
```
